price: O gün zalım kimsə barmaqlarını dişləyərək deyəcək: “Kaş ki, mən Peyğəmbərin yolunu tutub gedəydim!
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي ٱتَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaʿaḍḍu al-ẓālimu ʿalā yadayhi yaqūlu yālaytanī ittakhadhtu maʿa al-rasūli sabīlan
